title: Household waste reduction on limited budget
description: Household waste reduction on limited budget
content:
Scenario: Household waste reduction on limited budget
    Given Aisha wants to reduce waste
    And she has limited resources to invest in sustainability
    When the personal_agent analyzes household waste patterns
    Then it should identify specific reduction opportunities
    And it should suggest affordable waste reduction strategies
    And it should track improvement over time
    And recommendations should balance sustainability and budget constraints
    And Aisha should build sustainable household practices within her means
